name: Neighbor (itch) (Horatiu.nyc)
description:
Neighbor is a game about the price that comes with finding your dream apartment. 

Mysteries unfurl as the dark secrets of the house begin haunting our protagonist.

Two separate endings await, as well as a few hidden secrets that expand the world od Neighbor.

Play in browser or download the ROM!

Controls;

Arrow keys: Move

Z key: Interact

Built in GBstudio

Many thanks to the GBstudio community!
